text: join kids Hat [Music] Family the social skills [Music] Carnival tofu look at all the fun games and rides I love carnivals me too dear but sometimes I

learning to ride a roller coaster it might be scary at first but with practice it becomes so much [Music] fun Tia I want to join the game but I'm
not sure how to start that's okay tofu I will guide you through first approach them with a friendly greeting learn to
greet others with a warm smile and a friendly hello or hi a simple greeting can make a big difference in starting a
conversation hi my name is Tia and this is my brother tofu hi I'm tofu nice to meet you all hi Tia and tofu I'm Sarah want to join our
game sure we'd like have to next use eye contact learn the importance of maintaining eye contact while talking to someone it shows interest and
attentiveness in the conversation this is fun thanks for inviting us Sarah you're welcome tofu we love making new [Music]
friends let's try something else tofu how about starting a conversation with someone new okay but what do I talk about you
can ask about your favorite carnival game or share a fun fact about [Music] yourself hi I'm tofu do you have a favorite game at the carnival next tip
is active listening learn to be an active listener by giving full attention to the person speaking this means not interrupting and responding
appropriately when it's their turn to talk hi tofu I like the Ring Toss game the most what about you oh I love roller coaster rides they're so [Music]
thrilling great job tofu you made a new friend now the next tip is to share and take turns learn to share toys and take
turns during play dates or group [Music] activities Jil it's your turn at the Ring Toss game yay tofu thanks yeah you can have my popcorn thanks Chile
next be polite and kind always use polite words like please and thank you and be kind and respectful to others hey
Chile could you pass me the ring please sh tofu here you go thank you Jil you're welcome next find common interests learn
to identify y common interests with others sharing Hobbies or activities can be an excellent way to start conversations and build
friendships Jil do you like the Carousel Ride oh I love it yay me too let's take the carousal ride next shall we yeah that would be
fun next learn some problem solving skills handle conflicts and disagreements respectfully learn to express your feelings calmly and find
Solutions together hey tofu won't you play with us anymore oh you found a new friend hi I'm Jil yeah Sophia I'd like to play with
you guys too maybe chile can join us too yeah yeah that sounds good come on we'd make a big group of friends together and
have so much fun yay thank you next be inclusive learn to include others in games and activities being inclusive makes everyone feel valued and
included hey sopia look there's a girl playing alone I think we should invite her too yeah that would be great hey I'm
sopia do you want to join us we are going to ride the roller coaster yay I would love to thank you next show empathy learn to understand and
recognize others feelings offer support and kindness when someone is sad or upset oh I am so scared of heights how
would I do this don't worry sopia just let go and enjoy we are all together yes sopia let's do it yay thank you for encouraging me [Music]
guys thanks Tia I had a blast tofu you did fantastic you made so many new friends today thanks diaa I couldn't have done it
without your help remember tofu developing social skills is an adventure it's okay to take small steps and soon you'll be a social butterfly you're
right dear I can't wait to make more friends and have more fun adventures together yay can you recall all the social skills that you learned today
approach with a friendly greeting use eye contact listen actively share and take turns be polite and kind find common interests learn problem solving
skills be inclusive show empathy great job tofu remember learning social skills takes time be patient and take help and guidance from your parents or
